summary: This bill, HR 2294, reauthorizes the Integrated Coastal and Ocean Observation System Act of 2009. The bill amends the original act by replacing "Council" with "Committee" in several instances. It also updates the language regarding the National Ocean Research Leadership Council to "Ocean Policy Committee" and makes adjustments to data sharing and operational oceanography measurements. Furthermore, it authorizes $56,000,000 for each of the fiscal years 2026 through 2030.
